body.name: Baby Remote Control Toy for 1 Year Old Boys Girls Gifts Realistic Toddler TV Remote Toy with Music and Light Early Education Learning Toy Remote Kid Infant Baby Toys for 6 to 12 Months 12 to 18 Months
features: Baby’s Remote Controller: Your little baby can enjoy imitative fun while playing with a TV remote control toy that looks just like Mom and Dad’s! Improve baby's cognitive abilities and they can experience the real life during imitation. Keeps baby busy for a long time playing with the toy remote for toddlers 1-3. Let toddlers enjoy their own play remote!

Safe for Babies: Made of premium ABS and silicone, BPA-Free, durable and not easy to fade. The toy remote for baby with smooth edges, rounded corners and no burrs. Soft light and voice can attract the baby's attention without hurting their eyes and hearing. Mom can buy with confidence, baby can play at ease.

Early Educational Toys: Pressing different keys of this fake remote to switch over 50 different music, numbers, animal sounds and other sound effects. This kid remote toy has three languages, English, French and Spanish, improve baby's cognition of numbers and language learning ability, babies can learn while playing this pretend play toy.

Unique Design: Each baby musical toy designed in perfect size, portable and easy for children to hold. The buttons have number texture to enhance sensory stimulation. Baby’s little hands will become more flexible as they play, and also promote their hand-eye coordination. Adjustable volume function, allows parents to control volume of the sounds.

Best Gift: This baby TV remote toy is a perfect gift for 1 year old boys girls, preschoolers, infants and newborn babies. Great first birthday gifts for baby. Perfect for Holiday Toy Gifts, Christmas Gifts, Baby Shower, Easter Stuffer and other gift-giving events. 2 AAA batteries are required (not include).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Does your baby love to play TV remotes? Our little remote control toy, looked very realistic. Your child can enjoy imitative fun while learning numbers, colors and shapes with a remote control toy that looks just like their parents!The gentle sounds and soft light can entertain baby, fun for toddlers and keep them entertained for a long time. The 6 9 12 18 months babies can feel the fun of this funny toy remote for baby.It features channels keys to imitate a real TV remote switching between different channels, so that the baby can experience the real life during imitation.

Musical Baby Remote Control Toy SOFT LIGHT & PLEASANT SOUNDS Multiple modes, and over 50 sound effects in total. Babies can hear classic melodies, numbers, sound effects of animals and vehicles, and more. There is a soft light on the top of the remote controller toy, attracting the baby's attention without hurting their eyes.Built-in a high-quality speaker, the sound clear and graceful, and will not hurt baby's hearing. KEEP BABY SAFE High-quality food grade silicone, safe and durable. This toddler remote toy is great for babies to play with!The surface of the kid remote is smooth, no sharp corners, raw edges, no harm to the child’s skin.Streamlined waist design with good size, perfect for your little child to hold and play with. SPECIAL DESIGN, BETTER EXPERIENCE Unique number texture enhances the touch of baby's fingers.Adjustable volume, if you don't want to be disturbed by the sound of the toy, you can adjust the volume at any time to make it quieter.Through this imitative play, the infant toy introduces early concepts around numbers and shapes as children exercise their fine motor skills.

BABY' S TV REMOTE CONTROLLER! This realistic fake remote toy is small and lightweight, easy to carry. Your baby can play it anytime and anywhere. Pressing buttons bring a funny experience. Encourages and helps your baby to explore and learn.Keeps your little kids busy for a long time playing with the buttons and hearing the music.Our educational remote toy with colorful buttons, introduce colors and numbers to develop their cognitive and thinking ability.With automatic sleep mode, no operation is required, power saving and energy saving.

BEST GIFT FOR BABIES You won’t believe how much this small toddler remote toy can do. It’s a great travel toy. Perfect gifts toys for 1 year old boys and girls. This musical toy for 1 years old boys girls is a great gift for boys, girls, preschoolers and toddlers. Package Content Baby Remote Control Toy User's Manual Exquisite Packaging Box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome! Not obnoxious! Not overstimulating!
reviews.reviewText: We were looking for an “electronic”ish toy for our toddler daughter that isn’t overstimulating and obnoxious. We try to steer clear of those types of toys. This little remote is awesome!!! It has gentle noises and simple song tones (not entire songs). It only makes the brief sound when the button is pushed (cause and effect!!) There are no overstimulating flashing lights (no lights at all actually). When you push the numbers it actually says the numbers (educational) and it does so in a normal humans voice. I swear to you, if they made other items, just like this, I would buy all of them. Simple toys that aren’t overstimulating and obnoxious need to make a come back. This is it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I literally leave this one out all of the time and my daughter doesn’t even attempt to reach out for ours anymore!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is very kid friendly- totally love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My 15 month-old grandson loves this, but I don't let him chew it
reviews.reviewText: The volume is low, so it does not bother other people if my grandson is playing with it when we are out in public. It requires some sequencing of button use that he will have to learn as he gets older, but there are enough sounds he can access now to enjoy playing with this toy. Caution: It should NOT be chewed, so I let him have it only for supervised play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son plays with it a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's nice but the super low volume ruins it
reviews.reviewText: The remote is very realistic and attracts my toddlers. But the sound is barely audible. Even at the highest volume it's very low.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and helpful!
reviews.reviewText: My 10 month old is obsessed with our tv remotes, so we needed to find a safe look-alike toy. This was a perfect toy! She is able to play with it, and use it as a teether too! The buttons are bright and colorful, and it is very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You need this so your kid doesn’t change the channel on you!
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best baby toys we’ve bought. It has saved us from the baby taking the real remote and hitting buttons. Plus the music and multiple language features make it fun and don’t have our daughter lose interest
